ai.summary: Green Trail is a short, easy 3 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families, offering a pleasant stroll along a flat, well-marked route.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail runs on a flat to gently undulating surface with well-maintained paths, grassy ground and light woodland. Expect occasional roots and shade.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather before you go, as UK conditions can be changeable. Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear and bring a light layer. Stay on the marked path, keep children and pets under supervision, and carry a map or fully charged phone. Bring water and sun protection in dry or sunny conditions. If visibility is reduced or you feel unwell, turn back and seek assistance.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (or fully charged phone)

seo.title: Green Trail - Easy 3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Green Trail, a short and easy 3 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families, with flat terrain and light shade.
seo.h1: Green Trail: Easy 3 km Hike in the UK
